page.title: 13 LIVING IN A PUB
page.content: My name is Jamie Tarrington I am 11 years old. I live in the Saling Oak. the Saturday before last I got up at half past twelve.I got dressed and went downstairs I checked the machines, cleaned the plates, replaced the food in the cabinets and helped serve.At the end of the day I emptied the machines and carried the money over to the bar. I get on well with the customers. I am allowed to watch the Banger Racing which takes place every few weeeks in a field directly opposite. When it is finished many of drivers come and have a drink at our pub. I like living in a pub , but I would also like to live on an estate where I could play with my friends. When it gets too busy in the pub I go and watch a video upstairs. I enjoy my homelife because of the atmosphere.
